title: Massaging the Babysitter
description: Becky the babysitter asked if she could get a massage instead of payment. Alex is a masseur who has always fantasized about his hot babysitter. What starts as a professional massage soon gets steamy as both Becky and Alex are too turned on to stop! WARNING - EXPLICIT This short story contains graphic sex between an older man and the 18 year old babysitter.
author: R. James
